com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence.impl
Class XmlPersistencePolicy

java.lang.Object
  com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence.PersistencePolicy
      com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence.impl.XmlPersistencePolicy

public class XmlPersistencePolicy
extends PersistencePolicy

This class provides runtime resolution for model persistence through XML map files (imf.xml). Each persistent entity should have an imf.xml file associated with it and placed in res/raw. If an entity has no such file, it is marked as transient.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0 05/09/12
Author:
Tyler Treat
See Also:
AnnotationsPersistencePolicy
